BLL

Class ProjectRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • BLL.ProjectRegister

  • public class ProjectRegister
extends java.util.Observable
    A singleton register for all projects

                 Client client,

        Creates and add project to register (projectName must be unique)
        Parameters:
        projectName - Name of project
        discTitle - Title of the disc to be produced
        client - Customer of the project
        region - Region disc is for
        projectManager - Manager of project
        dueDate - Date for project completion
        Returns:
        Confirmation record has been created
